title: Divinity Diamond Haaram Set with Emerald Accents
materials: brilliant-cut diamonds. Features a central emerald (Panacha Ratham) and a ruby gemstone (Ratna Ratham) within the earrings. Adorned with lustrous South Sea Pearls. Boasts a radiant
features: This exquisite Haaram embodies classic South Indian elegance. The necklace showcases an intricate floral and leaf-motif design, encrusted with sparkling diamonds. The pendant features a stunning central emerald, surrounded by a halo of diamonds. The chandbali earrings complement the necklace perfectly, featuring delicate filigree work and pearl drops. The setting style ensures maximum brilliance of the diamonds. The floral motifs lend a distinctly Telugu touch to the piece.
colors: with striking emerald green and ruby red accents. The pearls add a soft
creamy hue that balances the brilliance of the diamonds.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also perfect for Seemantham ceremonies
description: This Haaram set is a testament to exceptional craftsmanship and timeless design. It combines the grandeur of traditional South Indian jewelry with the modern appeal of diamonds. The 'Hyderabadi Polish' ensures long-lasting shine and durability. The use of genuine gemstones adds significant value and auspiciousness. A perfect heirloom piece to be treasured for generations. This Haaram is a true statement of grace and prosperity.
